column3:
“One of the first legendary strains, in my opinion, I tried.

I understand highly what it means when they say, if enjoyed too much
column4: can bring on a deep sleep".

column1: Me and my girl got a bag of this stuff
column2: smelled amazing and was sticky like syrup.
packed my favourite Yoda bong with a fat bowl
column3: hit it
column4: put a bowl for my girl and she hit it.

column2: I would like to note here
column3: is  almost immediate

“my favorite indica, makes you feel like warm melting butter, one bowl put me to sleep even though i usually have to take like 3 wax hits to sleep. great for insomnia, extreme stress relief, muscle tightness, nerve pain. i havent tried it in the daytime.”
“Instantly melts your body into a feel-good Jell-O but you are in control. Instantly relaxed stress anxiety believed in overall feeling of well-being this is a great strain”

“This Bushy, sturdy, resilliant Cannabis Plant is Legendary! I've grown her outdoors in the Puget Sound Region and she loves the atmosphere. After the Dark Green Foliage is formed I cut the larger fan leaves to give the bottom some love too. This babe flowers at warp speed without much smell at all. It produces light green flower with the most trichome coverage i've ever seen! After the full plant hang dry and subsequ...”

“DANK!!! Strong aroma, beautiful to look at, covered in white crystals. Smokes well and tastes fine but causes major cottonmouth. After a single bowl my whole body felt relaxed, after 3 bowls I melted into the couch. Perfect for pain relief of any kind, insomnia, and even anxiety!”

“Like a bag full of sugar, this strain is covered in crystals.
I recently purchased a lovely roor glass bong (well worth the money) and decided i would try something new, and i tried the legendary leaf it is amazing!!! After my 2nd bowl i started sinking into the couch and then i laughed for a while, and finished off as a struggle to hold my eye-lids up. I would recomend this to anyone who has sleeping problems or un...”
“Insomnia has been a problem but not with this strain. Maple Leaf Indica has a purpose and seems to deliver everytime!”
“Solid strain!  mixed it with another indica and knocked me out! Also very nice taste to it”
“Solid strain!  mixed it with another indica and knocked me out! Also very nice taste to it”

“Helped all symptoms to do with colitis - nausea, pain, appetite, anxiety and stress. Really great for depression also. Heavy couch locking body buzz with a strong uplifting and creative head high. Perfect for late afternoon and evening time, would love to try this herb again”
“this shit fucked me upp!!!”

“One of my all time favorites :) perfect indica-balanced high not couch locking but uplifting. Years ago she gave me a few expressions-one that tasted like drinking maple syrup, another like eating pancakes. Was a fine yielder as well. If i could grow would get seeds and do the whole garden to find the syrup again. To this day flavor wise only the dj shorts blue from 2000 era can compete-the one that tasted like the m...”

“A good indica it really helps with sleep also it is sedative and you will feel so relaxed that you won't get up hahaha. The smell of this strain is pretty sweet and the flavor is sweet.
I smoked this strain in vaporizer and pipe, i think that is better to smoke it in vaporizer because it kicks better and last longer.
Greetings from Mexico :)”
“The strain maple leaf made me feel less pain, less stress, but made me hungry!”
“Canadias weed is good weed. Just look at bc bud. Great taste. Great smell. Good high. Enough said. Makes me very sleepy good for insomnia”
“the maple leaf indica im refering to is a pheno thats from florida. ive been smoking this strain for the last 10 years. its the stinkyest herb ive ever came across.super dense, super potent”

“First strain of Indica I have ever smoked and all I can say is WOW! I am super relaxed, my anxiety has calmed, and I could easily fall asleep. I have a few chronic issues that cause pain all day and this has relieved much of the pain.”
“smooth , i like it”
“One of the best strains I've smoked yet. Definitely a very heavy indica. I just smoked a bowl of this listening to late night jazz" on Spotify
“Smooth tasting heavy indica”

“Maple leaf was my first high. I felt very relaxed and my whole body had a slight vibration. Wonderful head high with it as well. Smoked one joint 1 gram lasted about 4 hours of complete and total bliss. Like other reviews state this is like having your favorite blanket wrapped around you.”

“Not only does this smell delicious, it tastes so yummy and fruity. You can smell and taste a strong grape flavor and for me, that's always a plus. Something about fruity strains. This high kinda creeps up on you. The body relaxing happens right away though, and I just sank back into the couch feeling relaxed and warm and happy. Maple Leaf isn't too heavy of a hitter but more than gets the job done. I have nothing bad...”
“The taste is one of the best (vaporize)”
“This is an ok strain. Hits good and tastes a bit like maple. Kind of gave me a headache though. I had to mix this with some pennywise to offset the headache.”

“Excellent strain really relaxing,puts you happy, get a deeper sleep, concentration the only that I didn't liked was feeling sleepy, also my eyes were near to close because I am asiactic but I hate that because it makes you look really passed out.
Greetings everyone from Mexico City were they are excellent Kush.”

“I have nick-named this strain, Night Night" as it is simply exceptional for giving you the best sleep you have ever had. It truly is one of my favorites of all time. Very consistent and the flavor is wonderful and not overpowering. I would call this a "heavy indica" which has obvious medicinal qualities. A truly wonderful companion after a hard day of work. I LOVE this strain . . . you will not be disappointed in th...”"

“A quality indica strain to say the least. The onset is fast and sedating. It seemed to have an aphrodisiac effect that was smooth and euphoric. Never had it or even seen it before, but I would keep this strain on hand at all times if I could!!”

“Smoked this after I got out of the hospital, and it was pretty decent. More of a strain you'd wanna smoke if you can't sleep though. Didn't help much with my joint pain or the inflammation throughout my body, but I definitely passed out every time I smoked this.
Overall rating would be about a 3.5/5.”
“very sweet smelling. smooth high. perfect for late night smoking.”
“The history behind this plant is crazy. Looooved smokin it. Just fantastic.”
“Have a bile movement”
“Haven't tried but from what i have heard it is a nice smooth strain!!”
